swipeLeft().Description: Called when the user quickly moves the finger from right to left.
swipeLeft().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 29

swipeDown().Description: Called when the user quickly moves the finger from up to down.
swipeDown().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 29

Parameters: int: this is the key that was pressed

int: the codes for all the possible alternative keys with the primary code being the first. If the primary key code is a single character such as an alphabet or number or symbol, the alternatives will include other characters that may be on the same key or adjacent keys. These codes are useful to correct for accidental presses of a key adjacent to the intended key.
onKey(int,int[]).Description: Send a key press to the listener.
onKey(int,int[]).history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 29
onKey(int,int[]).FullName: public abstract void onKey (int primaryCode, int[] keyCodes)

Parameters: int: the code of the key that was released
onRelease(int).Description: Called when the user releases a key. This is sent after the @B_android#inputmethodservice#KeyboardView#OnKeyboardActionListener#onKey_E@ is called. For keys that repeat, this is only called once.
onRelease(int).history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 29

Parameters: CharSequence: the sequence of characters to be displayed.
onText(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Sends a sequence of characters to the listener.
onText(java.lang.CharSequence).history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 29

Parameters: int: the unicode of the key being pressed. If the touch is not on a valid key, the value will be zero.
onPress(int).Description: Called when the user presses a key. This is sent before the @B_android#inputmethodservice#KeyboardView#OnKeyboardActionListener#onKey_E@ is called. For keys that repeat, this is only called once.
onPress(int).history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 29

swipeRight().Description: Called when the user quickly moves the finger from left to right.
swipeRight().history: Added in API level 3 Deprecated in API level 29

swipeUp().Description: Called when the user quickly moves the finger from down to up.

These codes are useful to correct for accidental presses of a key adjacent to the intended key.
